nodes.documentation: Create a new Master and auditor with $(_numProposals) different ipfs_hashes.

Give $(toDevice) the right to add data on this contract
 May only be called by $(auditor).

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Master.IPFS_Hash storage ref[] storage ref
